name: Krow
description:
Krow is the story of a bird who wants to reach to the moon !

The full game will be an interesting and darker take on the all-time classic Space-Harrier, but for now it's more of a technical demo ;)

Gather 20 moonbeams to pass the first (and only) level. You have 3 lives to achieve that.

Art, code and design by Alex Hiza (LordKraken), except moon and cloud art by Ansimuz.
